title: Social Media Giant Reddit Reveals Bitcoin ($BTC) and Ether ($ETH) Holdings
description: Social media giant Reddit has revealed investments of its excess cash in Bitcoin ($BTC) and Ether ($ETH), placing it among a select group of companies like MicroStrategy and Tesla that hold digital assets directly. This disclosure came in a filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) as part of the company’s upcoming initial […]

title: Is Google’s AI Strategy Driving Users Away?
description: In a whirlwind of activity, Google has unleashed a barrage of new AI offerings, leaving consumers scratching their heads in confusion. This chaotic strategy threatens not only to undermine public trust in artificial intelligence but also Google’s own credibility as a leader in the field. The rapid-fire introduction of products like Bard, Gemini, and Gemini […]

title: US Banks Lose $492,000,000 of Customer Funds in One Year As Successful Scams Skyrocket: Report
description:
US banks failed to stop scammers from stealing nearly half a billion dollars of their customer’s money in 2023, according to a new report from the Federal Trade Commission (FTC). In an overview on the state of scamming, the FTC says It tracked 11,950 reports of bank transfer and payment fraud in 2023, with banking […]

The post US Banks Lose $492,000,000 of Customer Funds in One Year As Successful Scams Skyrocket: Report appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
